trait.name: Swift Predator
entries: When Castor Chitinous grapples a target or holds prey in its mandibles, its speed is increased by 10ft, and it releases a noxious gas that surrounds it, preventing opportunity attacks until it releases the grapple or consumes its prey.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Castor Chitinous makes three attacks: two with its mandibles and one with its stinger if the target is {@condition grappled} by its mandibles.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6+4}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and Castor Chitinous can't use its mandibles on another target.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Swallow (Paralyzed Grappled Target)
entries: Castor Chitinous makes one attack against a Medium or smaller creature that is both {@condition paralyzed} and {@condition grappled}, the target is swallowed. The swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Castor Chitinous, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Castor Chitinous's turns. If Castor Chitinous takes 10 or more damage in a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the swallowed creature, which falls {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of Castor Chitinous. If Castor Chitinous dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 30 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must make a {@dc 16} Dex save or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Venomous Spines
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 0} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.
